oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Koranna-Hottentot Words, with their Bushman and English translations from =kasin (B XXV. 2365-2373, 2375-2413; L IV.-1. 3482-3484) This includes parts of the body, plants, numerals and details of the uses of bushes named.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Koranna words with |xam and English translations
